definition: to enquire solicitously about sb's well-being (idiom)/to pamper
to exhale slowly/to hiss/hush!
cold/poor/to tremble
to ask
warm/to warm

sentences.english: He asked me questions and read the New Yorker.
sentences.chinese: 他對我噓寒問暖，喜歡讀《紐約客》雜誌。

sentences.english: When weather changes or physical discomfort will ask people whether they feel hot, show the utmost solicitude.
sentences.chinese: 逢天氣劇變或身體不適便噓寒問暖，關懷備至。

definition: (Tw) from time to time/frequently
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
affectionate/intimate/warmhearted/to get intimate with sb
to take care of/to raise money/to attend to (guests, customers etc)
simple home-style meal/common occurrence/nothing out of the ordinary
neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
genuine and sincere (idiom)/wholehearted
to fall short of/to have a deficit/deficit/deficiency
to warn repeatedly/to urge/to exhort again and again
to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
at all times/at every moment
happily
to murmur endearments (idiom)/to get into a romantic relationship
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
